rules: Rule1: If the vehicle needs repair, then the company purchased the vehicle.
Rule2: Provided that the vehicle is stored in the warehouse, the vehicle needs repair.
Rule3: Whenever the vehicle has insurance under the policy, it follows that the vehicle is stored in the warehouse.
Rule4: If the clerk processed the request, then should the manager have approved the request, it follows that if the vehicle is not functional, then the vehicle is stored in the warehouse.
Rule5: If the vehicle was sold to the scrapyard, then the vehicle was disposed of.
Rule6: In cases where the clerk did not process the request, the vehicle was sold to the scrapyard.
Rule7: If the vehicle is not functional, then the vehicle has insurance under the policy.
facts: Fact1: The manager approved the request.
Fact2: It is not the case that the company purchased the vehicle.
Fact3: The vehicle was not disposed of.
